sub_title: Consultant / Administrateur Délégué at CEOrg CONSULTING (Centre d'Expertise Organisationnelle) SComm
summary:
Corporate generalist, financial and operational expert with a broad expertise in risk, control and corporate governance (GRC) activities. Track record in implementation and management of internal audit departments in international environments. Member of boards of international professional associations and highly interested in the advocacy of the internal auditor roles and responsibilities.
Regularly involved in professional forums, conferences and trainings on GRC. 

Specialties: Auditors role in the Enterprise Risk Management process
Internal Audit Methodology and Tools
Integration of risk and audit roles 
Business Continuity Management
Quality Assurance review
Effective Code of conduct and ethics
Fraud and its governance
Risk based internal audit plans
Creation and upgrading of internal audit value
Implementation and Evaluation of integrated Risk Management process
